question:
Each year, your company gives an Employee of the Year award to a worker who has performed exceptionally well. You believe that someone with whom you work should receive the award this year.Write a letter to your supervisor. In the letter- Describe your colleague’s job at the company

- Describe a time you worked with this person
- Explain why you believe this person deserves the award
text: I would be glad to take some of your time for discussing the actual Employee of the Year nomination. I feel that I have some proven ideas about the candidates and their reasons. As you know, I am the Employee of the Year 2021, hence, I am keen on this ceremony and criteria.

Firstly, I am proud to give you our department's candidate,  John Cummings . He is a manager with proven experience in our company, moreover, all the workers in the Marketing section gave their votes for John. It was not a surprise for us.

We are working productively with John for the 4 last years, I saw how he  started working as a courier and made his next steps. Furthermore, now he has a real opportunity to become the head of a brunch and now I hope to see his future roles in the executive team.

In conclusion, I recommend Cummings for this nomination because he is a seasoned manager and a patient friend who is always ready to help his counterparts. He is one of the most prudent marketing specialists I have ever seen.
Thank you for your consideration of my notice.
